lines.text: Maybe he tried to run out of the fire, but...
One of the wizards stuck him with a <c=#FF0000>Reversing Rune!</c>
He tried to run away from the fire, but the rune just made him run straight into the fire!
By the time the sticker burned away and he could run away properly, it was way too late!
Does it... work that way, though?
Well, when you were readin' out what that spell does, you said it makes somethin' just reverse velocity.
Doesn't say anything about acceleration. Would it really have that effect on someone standin' still?
Like, maybe? But, yeah, I guess there's a <c=#FF00FF>more direct</c> way to trap him in the fire.
